abstract.t: SASL provides a method for adding authentication support with an optional security layer to connection-based protocols. It also describes a structure for authentication mechanisms. The result is an abstraction layer between protocols and authentication mechanisms such that any SASL-compatible authentication mechanism can be used with any SASL-compatible protocol. This document describes how a SASL authentication mechanism is structured, how a protocol adds support for SASL, defines the protocol for carrying a security layer over a connection, and defines the EXTERNAL SASL authentication mechanism.
